tests.title: UAT: Expense CRUD with sync validation

steps.label: Record expense count from both Windows and mobile apps, ensure mobile is on WiFi. NOTE: HomeBudget UI will close automatically during each CLI operation and reopen when complete.
Create test expense
steps.command: hb expense add --date 2026-02-17 --category "Food (Basic)" --subcategory "Cheap restaurant" --amount 25.50 --account "TWH - Personal" --notes "UAT Expense Create 01"

steps.label: Verify SyncUpdate created
Verify: New expense appears in Windows app AND mobile app
List expenses to get key
Record the expense key
Read expense
Verify: Expense details match what was entered
Update expense
Verify SyncUpdate created for update
Verify: Updated expense appears in Windows app AND mobile app
Delete expense
Verify SyncUpdate created for delete
Verify: Expense removed from Windows app AND mobile app
